title: Autumn apple bread and butter pudding
ingredients: ['1 large baguette', '85g butter', '1 large apple - peeled, cored and finely grated', '1 large pear - peeled, cored and finely grated', '55g sultanas', '600ml double cream', '250ml full fat milk', '4 tablespoons golden caster sugar', '4 egg yolks, beaten', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
